entries.author: aristotle_pagaltzis
entries.text: Aristotle has released Plack::Middleware::SignedCookies to CPAN. It is Plack middleware that "signs outgoing cookies on the server with a HMAC digest and verifies the digest on incoming cookies. If a cookie doesnâ€™t pass the signature test, it is dropped on the floor and your application never gets to see it".

entries.text: The first stable release of the Rust programming language was announced this week. "Rust combines low-level control over performance with high-level convenience and safety guarantees. Better yet, it achieves these goals without requiring a garbage collector or runtime, making it possible to use Rust libraries as a 'drop-in replacement' for C". Rust's equivalent of CPAN is crate.io, which currently has 2,092 crates.
entries.title: Announcing Rust 1.0
